name: UPDATE 2/19/20 Google Docs Sepia Dark Theme V2.3.1
description:
A fix for the recent update on google docs that broke every single other dark theme here. Makes everything on google docs black and sepia.

To remove the sepia paper, edit the CSS by scrolling all the way down and changing the "BEGIN Sepia Background" section's #F3EAD9 hex code to whatever color/hex you want. White hex is #ffffff

Feel free to message me if this ever breaks again.
additional_info:
3/26/20201 VV2.3.1 BUGFIX
- Repaired background from white to dark grey after google docs changed variables.

2/19/2020 V2.3.0
- Fixed text of outline color from black to white. More visible.
- Changed highlight of outline tab from white to black.
- Changed finder (CTRL+F) to the dark and sepia from white. 
- Changed Share button to orange from blue.

1/27/2020 V2.2.2
- Changed outline text color from grey to white. Now more visible.
- Changed side panel arrow circle container after expanded to beige. Previously white.

10/26/2019 V2.2.1
- Made 'Explore' tab night mode.
- Changed outline to dark instead of sepia
- Added night mode to rulers

10/25/2019 - V2.2.0
- Added sepia to background of Outline icon & Outline background.

2/25/2019 - V2.0.1
- Fixed explore icon color
- Fixed side panel icon color
- Turned right side panel into dark grey to match theme.

2/24/2019 - V2.0.0
- Added outline/navigation color contrast. 
- Fixed ctrl+f and find highlights

Known issues:
Suggestions are white
Some outlines are white
Numbers on rulers are too dark to see
Ruler icons are blue not orange

discussions.name: Please let me know if you run into any issues or if I missed anything that needs Sepia/Dark mode.
Background of the Doc is white
